typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		object_story_spec as (instagram_actor_id as long, message as string)[],
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(object_story_spec),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		status,
		instagram_id = object_story_spec.instagram_actor_id,
		message = object_story_spec.message
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		status as string,
		instagram_actor_id as string,
		message as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['creatives.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
